alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 16 at 8:36PM EST until November 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. The heaviest snow will occur tonight into early Thursday morning over far western Wyoming county. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Wyoming, Chautauqua, and Cattaraugus counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 10 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The heavy snow could also bring down some tree limbs and cause scattered power outages. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4261 7809 4270 7817 4281 7833 4276 7900 4234 7970 4227 7975 4235 7933 4250 7904 4255 7864 4256 7828 TIME Y22M11D17T0000Z-Y22M11D17T0600Z COORD...4249 7844 4266 7836 4271 7844 4272 7888 4259 7911 4243 7955 4232 7975 4203 7976 4214 7948 4224 7905 TIME Y22M11D17T0600Z-Y22M11D17T1800Z COORD...4233 7912 4239 7911 4244 7916 4242 7943 4238 7944 4230 7959 4227 7972 4219 7973 4220 7941 4222 7941 TIME Y22M11D17T1800Z-Y22M11D18T0000Z COORD...4298 7836 4308 7847 4307 7883 4300 7898 4281 7890 4255 7936 4261 7908 4267 7898 4273 7870 4282 7848 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
